title: Krvácení

5	Zbraně
content:
Krvácení is a kritický efekt with the following characteristics:

Continuous loss of vitality
Attack efficiency reduced - reduced hit, parry and dodge efficiency
Chance of dodging and parrying opponent attacks reduced
Susceptibility to Pain critical effect increased
